ca.hullabaloo.util.sax
Class SaxSimpleElementSelector

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl
      ca.hullabaloo.util.sax.SaxSimpleElementSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
ElementSelector, SaxElementSelector, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, org.xml.sax.XMLFilter, org.xml.sax.XMLReader
public abstract class SaxSimpleElementSelector
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl
implements SaxElementSelector

Abstract class to create simple ElementSelector -- one which just checks tag name & attributes. This must be in the XMLFilter chain before any filters that use the selector.

Note: This is an XMLFilter and should be in the filter pipeline before any other filters that depend on it. Normally, that means first.

disable

public void disable()
Disable selection of any further elements, helpful when looking for the first instance of a cell. Does also provide some performance improvment on large documents if your match is towards the beginning

Specified by:

selectElement

protected abstract boolean selectElement(java.lang.String uri,
                                         java.lang.String localName,
                                         java.lang.String qName,
                                         org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
If this method returns true, the isSelected() tag will return true until this element ends. This method is called only when isSelected() is false.

Parameters:
uri - the namespace uri
localName - the localName
qName - the qualified name
atts - the attributes
Returns:
true on matching elements
